Class NZMobilePayerIdType

Provides methods for validation and normalising NZ mobile phone number based payer ids.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Normalize(String)

Attempts to normalise a string containing a phone number to a form that can be used as a payer id.

Declaration
public string Normalize(string userInput)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String userInput

A string containing a phone number.
Returns
Type Description
System.String

A new string containing the normalised form of the phone number.
Remarks

This method will remove non-numeric characters commonly used in phone numbers (+ ( ) - etc) as well as whitespace in the string provided. The result is validated via the IsValid(String) method before being returned, and if invalid an exception is thrown.

This method will also attempt to convert international numbers (i.e those starting with +642x or 642x) to local numbers.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

Thrown if userInput is null.
System.ArgumentException

Thrown if userInput is an empty string or contains only whitespace characters.
OnlineEftposInvalidDataException

Thrown if the converted userInput value does not pass validation by the IsValid(String) method, or if it contains non-numeric characters that are not commonly used in phone numbers.

Implements

IPayerIdType
